parameters: Power Surge : Instantly increase TP by 70.
Battlecry : Increase all allies Attack and Magic Attack by
Shattering Strike : Strike an enemy for 200% Mixed damage.
Reduces the target's Defense and Magic Defense for 3 turns.
Concussive Blow : Strike an enemy for 250% Mixed Damage.
Rally : Increase all allies Defense and Magic Defense
Overpower : Reduce all enemies Attack and Magic Attack
Taunt : Massively increase hostility, massively increase
Ultimate Barrier : Grants the party 100% damage reduction
Minor Healing : Heal one ally for 100 + 70% Magic Attack.
Slow : Remove one SP from a target.
Cure : Remove 2 debuffs from all allies.
Resurrect : Revive one ally with 30% HP.
